Instance.description: Tuning used by CAS to represent a group (tab) of preference categories.

TunableList.name: ages
TunableList.description: The allowed ages for this Preference Group.

Tunable.name: capacity
Tunable.description: The number of preferences from this group that can be selected.

TunableList.name: categories
TunableList.description: The categories that are in this group.

Tunable.name: counter_text
Tunable.description: The text we want to use for this preference group to show the number of selected likes/dislikes for each category.

Tunable.name: detailed_description
Tunable.description: A description used to help explain what this group represents. Used as a tooltip for the group's tab in CAS.

Tunable.name: dislike_button_text
Tunable.description: The text we want to use for this preference group to select that the sim dislikes the category.

Tunable.name: header_name
Tunable.description: The name of this group that we want to use in header contexts.

Tunable.name: help_tooltip
Tunable.description: The tooltip to use on the help icon in CAS when this group is selected. Parameters: 1. This group's capacity. 2. This group's name.

Tunable.name: icon
Tunable.description: The icon that represents this group.

Tunable.name: icon_selected
Tunable.description: The icon to show when this group is selected.

Tunable.name: items_name_negative
Tunable.description: The name of the 'negative' items for this group, such as 'Dislikes'. Should be plural.

Tunable.name: items_name_negative_header_formatted
Tunable.description: A version of Items Name Negative, formatted as a header.

Tunable.name: items_name_positive
Tunable.description: The name of the 'positive' items for this group, such as 'Likes'. Should be plural.

Tunable.name: items_name_positive_header_formatted
Tunable.description: A version of Items Name Positive, formatted as a header.

Tunable.name: like_button_text
Tunable.description: The text we want to use for this preference group to select that the sim likes the category.

Tunable.name: name
Tunable.description: The name of this group.

Tunable.name: none_selected_text
Tunable.description: The text we want to use for this preference group when a sim has not selected any items for this group.

Tunable.name: randomization_minimum_required_dislikes
Tunable.description: When randomizing, what are the minimum number of dislikes that must be selected?

Tunable.name: randomization_minimum_required_likes
Tunable.description: When randomizing, what are the minimum number of likes that must be selected?

Tunable.name: show_flair
Tunable.description: If checked, it will turn on a flair (glow) to call player's attention to that group

Tunable.name: telemetry_name
Tunable.description: The telemetry name for this preference group. Defining this field will cause the number of traits on a given Sim to be counted for GAME:CASS:EXIT telemetry.

Tunable.name: timeline_label_name
Tunable.description: The name of the label that we want to use for this preference group. This is used in several places in the UI.
